---
id: list-properties
title: "List properties"
description: "⚠ Warning: Properties are experimental and may change in the next update. ⚠ Retrieves a paginated list of properties available within a specific space. Each property record includes its unique identifier, name and format. This information is essential for clients to understand the available properties for filtering or creating objects."
sidebar_label: "List properties"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List properties"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/properties"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



⚠ Warning: Properties are experimental and may change in the next update. ⚠ Retrieves a paginated list of properties available within a specific space. Each property record includes its unique identifier, name and format. This information is essential for clients to understand the available properties for filtering or creating objects.
